name: Bakuretsu Hunter: Sorezore no Omoi...Nowaan Chatte
overview: Carrot, his brother Marron, and the sisters Tira and Chocola are what are known as "Sorcerer Hunters": warriors who serve the church to punish those Sorcerers who would use magic for evil against other humans. Seven years ago, an entire village mysteriously vanished during a festival; now, that same village has just as mysteriously reappeared. Knowing that Sorcerers are very likely responsible for whatever is happening, the Sorcerer Hunters have been dispatched to investigate, with a young woman named Schaal — the only survivor from the town after the incident — accompanying them on their journey. Bakuretsu Hunter: Sorezore no Omoi...Nowaan Chatte is an adventure game based on the Bakuretsu Hunter anime, featuring a new unique scenario not based on any story from the TV show or comic. The game mostly takes a visual novel format, made up of extended dialogue sequences with still images and occasional cutscenes and decision points to direct the story. The game also occasionally includes simple turn-based battle sequences, and sometimes the player must choose the next location to go from a map.
